items.title: Meditation and Mindfulness Exercises for Busy People
items.headline: 5-Minute Exercises to Slow Down, De-Stress, Feel at Peace, and Keep Your Sanity when Life Is Crazy
objectives_summary: Be better at managing stress and controlling anxiety
Stay calm when you face challenges and difficulties.
Keep your balance and stay grounded when life is crazy.

items.title: Wellbeing, Stress Management, & Emotional Resilience PART 2

items.headline: A guide for slightly more advanced students, for taking back control of your stress and wellbeing to change your life.
objectives_summary: Proven and easy to apply tips and techniques to reduce stress for those who know a little already
Reduce and better manage mild anxiety that has previously stopped you from being your best
Prevent or manage stress that has held you back

items.title: Simplicity - The Art of Living Free

visible_instructors.title: Brent Dalley
visible_instructors.name: Brent
visible_instructors.job_title: Trainer in: Leadership,  Marketing, Family Counseling

items.headline: Decluttering can simplify your living for life
objectives_summary: Did you know that clutter is a leading cause of anxiety according to several psychological studies?
In this course you will learn step by step in simple terms how to declutter every room in your home.
You will learn to do it  in a systematic, sustainable way.

items.title: Reduce Stress and Anxiety using Biophilic Therapy
items.headline: Using proven innovative step-by-step strategies to connect with nature, you can reduce stress, anxiety and depression
objectives_summary: Strategies to reduce stress, anxiety and depression using biophilic therapy

items.title: Wellbeing At Work: Reducing Stress and Increasing Resilience
items.headline: Manage pressure, reduce stress and increase your resilience
objectives_summary: Learn how to manage pressure, reduce the likelihood of suffering stress, and get strategies to build your resilience.
You will get a clear understanding of the difference between pressure and stress, how to deal with pressure and learn the benefits of increased resilience.
The course offers many easy to understand and simple to implement strategies that will help you to improve your immediate and long term well-being.

items.headline: Get Back Control - Shall We Tap That Anger Away?
objectives_summary: How to manage and release anger using this new and easy Energy EFT adaptation.
Understand how anger can be dissipated.
Discover root causes of this anger and how to safely release them.

items.title: Stress Management: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy- Accredited
items.headline: Learn how to deal with stress , overcome anxiety, develop emotional resilience using psychology, CBT & basic strategies
objectives_summary: Internal and external factors that aggravate stress
Overcoming anxiety that stems from being stressed out
Addressing effects of stress on your body and mind

items.title: How To Get Control Of Your Stress
items.headline: Instead of Stress Controlling You
objectives_summary: The truth about stress and why it’s an ‘inside’ job.
The 3 Ms of Understanding stress.
You'll learn about the four barriers that prevent you from reducing your stress.

items.title: Work Stress Management - The Essentials
items.headline: Don't let your work stress burn you! Explore with us practical coping strategies to better handle your work stress.
objectives_summary: to define and recognize professional stress, its sources and its impacts
to use practical, proven coping strategies to help better handle your work stress
to build personal and professional development strategies that work

items.title: Mindfulness Practice for Building Resilience
items.headline: Diving deep into mindfulness as a strategy for building resilience
objectives_summary: Students will learn about what mindfulness is and what it isn't.
Students will learn strategies and activities for practicing mindfulness.
Students will discover the barriers that can make practicing mindfulness difficult as well as mitigating them.

items.title: Meditation Session Mindfulness
items.headline: 8 Guided Meditation Sessions (Audio Based Video Format), Each With Specific Mindfulness Concept Breakdown
objectives_summary: Experience 8 themed guided meditation sessions
Learn key mindfulness based terms & explanations while you practice
Learn the preferred body positioning for mindfulness mediation practice

items.headline: Learn how to use Emotional Freedom Techniques (Tapping) specifically to release anxiety and panic attacks
objectives_summary: How to tap away anxiety and panic attacks using Emotional Freedom Techniques. L
earn the real reason why you had anxiety in the first place (it may surprise you) and discover how to manage or, dare I say, even overcome it.
Get empowered with techniques that really help.

items.headline: Powerful tools, techniques and ideas to reduce and manage stress and anxiety in your life.
objectives_summary: Identify specific areas in their life that are the cause of stress
Understand the negative affects of stress on the body and mind
Learn new highly effective techniques to reduce stress in the body and mind

items.title: Beat Overworked and Overwhelmed
items.headline: Learn how to calm yourself, keep perspective, cope with intense feelings, deal with difficult people and work overload.
objectives_summary: Calm yourself down to reduce the ravages of stress
Cope with your monster feelings like anger and despair.
Keep perspective in order to think clearly and make good decisions

items.title: Confident Communication and Powerful Public Speaking
items.headline: Public Speaking, Casual Conversations, and Phone Calls Made Simple With These Professional Speaking Tips and Strategies
objectives_summary: Students will learn to embrace their personality nuances
Students will learn how to leverage introverted tendencies in the workplace
Students will understand communication strategies to overcome fear of public speaking

items.title: Performing art at home. Movement, energy, creativity
items.headline: A 5 lesson program of improvised dance performance for boosting energy and immunity, and maintaining tone
objectives_summary: Energize and tone. From 15 minutes a day, together with the trainer, you will go through a cycle of classes from warm-up to free dance.

Minimizes anxiety. Every day we are overtaken by circumstances that provoke stress and cause anxiety. Physical exercise and performative practices are some of the best techniques that will help to cope with this problem.
Unlock creativity. Our classes provoke students to discover a creative approach to familiar things and events.
